function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Healthcare system miscommunication leading to inaccurate understanding of epidemic seriousness and required resources","Impact":"Inefficient epidemic response, inadequate health facilities, and delayed precautionary measures","Mitigation":"Improved internal communication, standardized reporting protocols, and regular updates to experts","Technologies":"Communication platforms, data visualization tools, and real-time reporting systems","People":"Healthcare professionals, government officials, and epidemic response teams","Owner":"Healthcare administration and government agencies"},{"Description":"Public misunderstanding of epidemic complexity and risk analysis","Impact":"Inappropriate public response, disregard for precautionary measures, and panic-driven behavior","Mitigation":"Expert-led public communication, simple and explicit information dissemination, and public engagement activities","Technologies":"Social media platforms, public health campaigns, and community engagement tools","People":"General public, community leaders, and public health educators","Owner":"Health experts and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Centralized or de-centralized risk communication management","Impact":"Inefficient communication flow, inconsistent messaging, and delayed response to emerging risks","Mitigation":"Establishment of standardized communication protocols, clear delineation of communication responsibilities, and regular coordination meetings","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms, information management systems, and communication monitoring tools","People":"Communication stakeholders, risk management teams, and decision-makers","Owner":"Risk communication management teams and government agencies"}]}
